name: Beat Sky Saber Storm
description:
We present one of the amazing shiny color box hitting game. In this game you enjoy beautiful gaming environment. The game-play is very simple and addictive. Hit the glowing beats with laser sword and safe the back wall from destruction.

If you miss the beats they directly hit to glass wall (back side of the player), as a result wall health will be down and wall will be destroyed. If wall will be destroyed your game will be failed. So hitting the right color of the beats with right laser sword is very important. Avoid to hit wrong beats with wrong colors.

Cool animations 3D animations and eye catching color makes player playing experience more joyful. Different player charters are also available in the game. So choice is yours chose the best characters and become crushing champion. This game is a great mixture of fun and techniques. Try your luck and show you hidden skills now. It is a endless game.
